des: "This is a great summer salad that goes especially well with steak or London broil.  A friend, who is a mushroom lover, concocted this one and everyone asks for the recipe!"
ins: In a large bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar and mustard.  Add mushrooms, celery, parsley, cheese and onions and toss until evenly coated.  Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.
